comment: Amazing service! The staff was very professional and friendly. My haircut turned out exactly as I wanted. The salon is clean and has a great atmosphere. Highly recommend Priya as a stylist - she really listens to what you want!
ownerResponse: Thank you so much, Sarah! We're thrilled you loved your new look. Priya will be delighted to hear your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

comment: Great haircut and friendly service. The stylist was skilled and attentive. Only minor issue was I had to wait about 15 minutes past my appointment time, but overall a good experience.
ownerResponse: Thank you for your feedback, Michael! We apologize for the wait and are working on improving our scheduling. We're glad you enjoyed the haircut!

comment: Excellent hair coloring service! The color turned out beautiful and exactly the shade I wanted. The stylist explained the process and made sure I was comfortable throughout. Will definitely be back!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Priya! We're so happy you love your new color. See you next time!

comment: As a tourist visiting Sri Lanka, I was nervous about getting my hair done here, but Elite Hair Studio exceeded all expectations! Professional, clean, and affordable. Highly recommend to fellow travelers!
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for trusting us with your hair! We're thrilled you had a great experience. Safe travels!

comment: Good spa treatment, very relaxing. The massage was excellent. The only issue was the music was a bit loud during the treatment. Otherwise, great experience!
Decent service but nothing exceptional. Staff was friendly but seemed a bit rushed. The haircut was okay but I expected more attention to detail for the price.
ownerResponse: Thank you for your honest feedback. We're sorry we didn't meet your expectations. We'd love another chance to serve you better!

comment: Best barber in Colombo! Consistent quality, friendly staff, and reasonable prices. I've been coming here for 6 months and never disappointed.
ownerResponse: Thank you for being such a loyal customer, David! We appreciate you!

comment: Nice salon with good ambiance. Got a blowout for a wedding and it looked great. Would have been 5 stars if they offered complimentary beverages like other salons.
Wonderful experience from start to finish! The consultation was thorough, the service was excellent, and I love my new hairstyle. The salon is spotless and the staff is so welcoming.
ownerResponse: Thank you, Ananya! Your kind words mean the world to us. See you soon!

comment: Disappointed with the hair coloring result. The color turned out much darker than what I asked for. Had to go to another salon to fix it. Customer service was polite but the end result wasn't satisfactory.
ownerResponse: We're very sorry to hear about your experience. Please contact us directly so we can make this right. We offer free color corrections.

comment: Excellent salon! I've been a customer for over a year. Priya is an amazing stylist who always knows exactly what I need. Highly professional and friendly atmosphere.
ownerResponse: Thank you for your loyalty, Nimal! We're lucky to have you as a customer!

comment: Great keratin treatment! My hair is so much smoother now. The process took a bit longer than expected but the results are worth it. Will definitely return.
Excellent experience at Golden Locks! The bridal package was worth every rupee. Kumari did an amazing job on my sister's wedding makeup and hair. Highly recommend for weddings!
ownerResponse: Thank you so much! We're honored to have been part of such a special day. Congratulations to the happy couple!

comment: Good salon in Kandy. The highlights turned out beautiful. Staff is professional and the salon has a nice ambiance. Slightly pricey but quality is good.
Best salon in Kandy! I've tried many salons but Golden Locks is by far the best. The hair spa treatment is heavenly and the staff is so skilled and friendly.
ownerResponse: Thank you, Malini! We're thrilled to be your go-to salon!

comment: Nice hair extension service. The extensions blend well with my natural hair. The process took about 2 hours which was expected. Happy with the results!
Fantastic hair straightening treatment! My hair has been frizz-free for weeks. The staff was professional and explained the aftercare process clearly. Worth the investment!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Michael! We're so happy you're loving your smooth hair!

comment: Average experience. The haircut was okay but I felt the stylist wasn't really listening to what I wanted. The salon is clean and well-maintained though.
ownerResponse: We apologize for not meeting your expectations. Please give us another chance and ask for our senior stylist!

comment: Excellent kids haircut service! My 5-year-old was nervous but the stylist was so patient and gentle. They even gave him a lollipop at the end. Will definitely be back!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Farah! We love making haircuts fun for little ones. See you both again soon!

comment: Style Avenue Spa is a hidden gem in Galle! The ambiance is so peaceful and relaxing. The manicure was perfect and the staff is incredibly friendly. Best spa experience I've had!
ownerResponse: Thank you so much! We're thrilled you enjoyed your spa day. We look forward to welcoming you back!

comment: Amazing facial treatment! My skin feels so refreshed and glowing. The therapist used all organic products as I requested. The entire experience was luxurious and relaxing.
ownerResponse: Thank you, Emily! We're so happy you loved our organic facial. Your skin looked radiant!

comment: Best full body massage in Galle! The therapist was skilled and the pressure was perfect. The spa is clean, quiet, and has a beautiful ocean view. Highly recommend!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Priya! We're delighted you enjoyed your massage. Come back anytime you need relaxation!

comment: Outstanding premium facial! My skin has never looked better. The LED therapy and serums made such a difference. Worth every rupee. The staff is knowledgeable and professional.
ownerResponse: Thank you so much! We're thrilled with your results. Looking forward to your next visit!

comment: Good spa experience. The pedicure was thorough and relaxing. The salon is beautifully decorated and very clean. Only issue was parking is a bit difficult in the fort area.
Wonderful gel nails service! The manicurist was so detailed and patient. My nails still look perfect after 2 weeks. The color selection is great too. Will definitely return!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Sarah! We're so glad your gel nails are holding up beautifully!

comment: Nice waxing service. Professional and relatively painless! The therapist was quick and efficient. The salon is hygienic and well-maintained.
Excellent threading service! Perfectly shaped eyebrows and the therapist was so skilled. No pain at all. Great prices too. This is now my go-to place for threading.
ownerResponse: Thank you, Nimal! We're happy to be your threading destination!

comment: Good spa overall. The massage was relaxing though I prefer firmer pressure. The ambiance is lovely with calming music and ocean views. Would recommend!
Fantastic spa experience! Came here for a weekend getaway and the spa treatments were the highlight. Professional staff, luxury products, and beautiful setting. Worth the drive from Colombo!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Rajesh! We're honored to have been part of your weekend retreat. Come back soon!

comment: Perfect bridal trial! The makeup and hair were exactly what I envisioned for my wedding. Sanduni was so talented and patient. Can't wait for my actual wedding day! Highly recommend this salon for brides.
ownerResponse: Thank you so much! We're thrilled you loved your trial. We can't wait to make you look stunning on your big day! Congratulations!

comment: Excellent groom grooming package! The haircut, shave, and facial were all top-notch. Felt pampered and looked great for my brother's wedding. Highly recommend for grooms!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Rajesh! We're so glad we could help you look your best. Hope the wedding was beautiful!

comment: Beautiful henna designs! The artist was so skilled and creative. The henna was dark and lasted for 2 weeks. Perfect for my cousin's wedding. Highly recommend!
ownerResponse: Thank you! We're so happy you loved your henna design. It looked stunning on you!

comment: Outstanding bridal makeup! I felt like a princess on my wedding day. The makeup was flawless and lasted all day. The hair styling was perfect too. Thank you Royal Bridal!
ownerResponse: Congratulations on your wedding! We're honored to have been part of your special day. You looked absolutely beautiful!

comment: Great party makeup service. The makeup artist was talented and friendly. The makeup looked perfect in photos. Only minor issue was running a bit behind schedule.
Perfect saree draping! The stylist was so skilled and quick. The saree looked elegant and stayed in place all evening. Great service!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Sarah! We're glad you felt confident and beautiful in your saree!

comment: Best beard trim in Jaffna! Quick, professional service. The barber really knows how to shape beards perfectly. Great prices too. My go-to place for grooming!
ownerResponse: Thank you for being such a loyal customer, Rajesh! See you next month!

comment: Excellent beard maintenance service as always! Consistent quality and friendly staff. Best grooming salon in Jaffna!
ownerResponse: Thank you again, Rajesh! Always a pleasure serving you!

comment: Good unisex salon with modern vibes. Got a trendy haircut and it turned out great. Staff is young and friendly. Walk-ins are welcome which is convenient!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Daniel! Glad you like your new look. Come back anytime!

comment: Quick and efficient express haircut! Perfect for busy professionals like me. No frills, just a good haircut in 20 minutes. Will be back!
Nice trendy salon. Got highlights and they look natural and well-blended. The stylist was creative and gave good suggestions. Prices are reasonable.
Average experience. The haircut was decent but not exceptional. Staff was friendly though. Good for quick cuts but might go elsewhere for more specialized services.
ownerResponse: Thanks for your feedback, Michael. We'd love to show you our full range of services next time!

comment: Best salon in Jaffna! Modern equipment, skilled barbers, and great atmosphere. Been coming here for months and never disappointed. Highly recommend!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Arun! We appreciate your loyalty and kind words!

comment: Love this salon! The express haircut was quick and professional. Perfect for when I'm in a rush. The ocean view from the salon is a bonus! Great service!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Farah! We're glad you enjoyed both the service and the view!

comment: Perfect beach waves styling! Exactly the look I wanted for the coastal vibe. The stylist was talented and the salon atmosphere is so refreshing. Loved it!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Ananya! Your beach waves looked stunning. Hope you're enjoying Matara!

comment: Nice coastal salon! Got a blowout before heading to the beach. The service was good and the salon has a relaxed, beachy vibe. Prices are fair for the location.
Wonderful salon experience! The hair spa was so relaxing and my hair feels amazing. The ocean breeze and sound of waves made it even more special. Highly recommend!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Emily! We're thrilled you enjoyed the spa experience. Come back soon!

comment: Good salon with friendly staff. Got a manicure and pedicure - both were done well. The salon could use more parking space but overall a pleasant experience.
Excellent barber service! Clean cuts, professional staff, and reasonable prices. The beach location is a great bonus. Best barber in Matara!
ownerResponse: Thank you, Dilshan! We're honored to be your go-to barber in Matara!
